definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
megabyte (2^20 or approximately a million bytes)
gigabyte (2^30 or approximately a billion bytes)
ByteDance, Beijing-based Internet technology company, founded in 2012

sentences.english: However, the equivalent English word "forest" takes six.
sentences.chinese: 而對應的英文字“forest”需要六個字節。

sentences.english: Look at the two bytes above highlighted in blue.
sentences.chinese: 看看上面兩個被用藍色高量顯示的字節。

sentences.english: A problem in which the line of dendrogram slips out of place in double byte languages was fixed.
sentences.chinese: 一個問題在該行樹簡出發生在雙字節語言是固定的。

sentences.english: And for that I need a byte of volunteers, alright?
sentences.chinese: 爲此，我需要一個字節的志願者，誰來？

sentences.english: The last byte illuminates and latches all odd-numbered LEDs.
sentences.chinese: 最後一個字節點亮並鎖存所有奇數LED。

sentences.english: The method for determining the required number of bytes is simple.
sentences.chinese: 確定所需要字節數的方法很簡單。

sentences.english: The majority is represented in bits and bytes sitting on a hard disk or zipping through a network.
sentences.chinese: 大部分是保存在硬盤或通過網絡壓縮的字節而已。

sentences.english: Either a bit- or byte-oriented format may be used.
sentences.chinese: 它的格式可以是一比特的或者一字節的。

sentences.english: The only proviso is that the bytecode modifications should be deterministic and predictable.
sentences.chinese: 惟一的要求是字節碼修改應該是確定性的且可預測的。

sentences.english: The length of the device token as a two-byte integer value in network order.
sentences.chinese: 設備令牌的長度爲兩個字節的整數值的網絡字節序。

sentences.english: The length of the device token as a two-byte integer value in network order.
sentences.chinese: 設備令牌的長度爲兩個字節的整數值的網絡字節序。

sentences.english: Copies a specified number bytes from a source address to a destination address.
sentences.chinese: 將指定數目的字節從源地址複製到目標地址。

sentences.english: The largest arrays available today are about 15 petabytes in size.
sentences.chinese: 如今在用最大的存儲陣列大約15拍字節。

sentences.english: The next field contains the length of the file in bytes.
sentences.chinese: 下一個字段包含文件的長度，以字節爲單位。

sentences.english: The next 2 bytes are different in the two frame formats.
sentences.chinese: 接着的2字節在這2種幀格式中是不同的。

sentences.english: The contents of each repeat bytes are taken from an 8-byte number.
sentences.chinese: 各個副本中的內容取自一個8字節長的數。
